description: This file defines a React functional component for a login page, handling user authentication via email and password inputs, managing login state, and navigation upon success or failure.

methods.name: Login()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form with email/password input fields, login handling, error display, and navigation.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Event handler called on form submission, performs login via context, handles navigation on success, sets error on failure.
